objects.text:
• Two adorable pet kitties included
• Palm tree, hammock & play features
• Comes with food bowls & toys

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner features a playful and vibrant design targeting children and toy enthusiasts. The layout is split into two sections: a pink gradient sidebar on the left and a pastel background with decorative curves and dots on the right. The left section holds multiple text elements, including a dominant main title ("heading"), a bold subheading ("subheading"), a bulleted description list ("description"), a price tag ("price") with a wavy underline, and a call-to-action button ("cta") resting on a soft green rounded rectangle ("cta_background"). The right section showcases a colorful toy playset image ("product_image").

**Color Palette:**  
- Pink Gradient: #FF80B4 → #FF4999  
- Light Background: #FFEAF3 → #E6FFF2  
- White Text: #FFFFFF  
- CTA Button: #4CE0B3  
- Accent Decorations: #FF80B4, #4CE0B3
product_color: The product image features a playful, vibrant color palette ideal for a child-friendly advertisement. Dominant hues include Bubblegum Pink (#F758B2) for the cat house, Leaf Green (#30A86E) on the tree and foliage, Sandy Beige (#F6C49B) for the base, and Sky Blue (#60C2F0) used in accessories like the hammock and bowl. Accent colors such as Lilac Purple (#C493F8) and Berry Red (#E32555) effectively highlight specific elements like toys and signs. The colors are well-blended with smooth transitions yet are contrasted strategically, making each component stand out. This playful coordination appeals to a young audience and promotes an engaging, imaginative setting.
